Why I Build Systems That Listen

현장에서 배운 한가지, 이번주의 생각

The Emperor of France and would-be ruler of Europe said goodbye to the Old Guard after his failed invasion of Russia and defeat by the Allies.

Soldiers of my Old Guard: I bid you farewell. For twenty years I have constantly accompanied you on the road to honour and glory. In these latter times, as in the days of our prosperity, you have never ceased to be models of courage and fidelity. With men such as you, our cause could not be lost; but the war has been too long, and the nation's strength is exhausted. I now go to join my son.
20/04/14

Editor’s Note

In a world full of data, she found meaning in patterns and people.

The fictional radio drama caused panic across America as listeners believed a Martian invasion was real.

This page is written by Hyemin Song, a developer who believes every system tells a human story. She writes about the invisible work behind everyday data.
24/10/25

Yes We Can

A New Dawn in American Politics

President-elect Barack Obama spoke to the world from his home city of Chicago as he became the first black president of the United States.

Hello, Chicago. If there is anyone out there who still doubts that America is a place where all things are possible, who still wonders if the dream of our founders is alive in our time, tonight is your answer. Hope - against fear, unity over division - marked the beginning of a new chapter in modern democracy.
05/11/08
